methods.text: Creates a new set of options with default mode/security settings for all platforms and also non-recursive.

methods.code: pub fn recursive(&mut self, recursive: bool) -> &mut Self
methods.text: Indicates whether to create directories recursively (including all parent directories). Parents that do not exist are created with the same security and permissions settings.

methods.code: pub async fn create(&self, path: impl AsRef<Path>) -> Result<()>
methods.text: Creates the specified directory with the configured options.
